author: Amarnath Tewary
text:
Both the ruling party Janata Dal(United) and the opposition Bhartiya Janata Party have come face to face over the venue to celebrate the former Bihar Chief Minister and socialist leader Karpoori Thakur jayanti at local Sri Krishna Memorial Hall in Patna on January 24.

“We’d applied on February 26 last year and even made the payment through bank draft in November”, said JD(U) spokesperson Sanjay Singh.

However, the State BJP president Mangal Pandey told journalists that his party would celebrate the event at SKM Hall and if the other party would pose any problem “our party workers are ready to take them on.”
title: Karpoori jayanti: JD(U), BJP vie for same venue
